title: Fat & Sugar Detox, 60 vegetarian capsules (Crystal Star)
cleaned_text: Want to do a diet reset and need some help with early toxin flush or metabolism support? Sometimes, you need a little help to just start fresh and give your body a little boost. Crystal Star Fat & Sugar Detox contains 28 whole herbs precisely blended for a cleansing detox to reset your bodys metabolism and help cut cravings for fat and sugar. With Green Tea Leaf and Chickweed to help the body burn and flush fat. [To see more results, click here for Advanced Search](https://www.pennherb.com/advancedsearch) AMOUNT PER SERVING (1 CAPSULE): Vitamin B6 Blend: Conjugated Linoleic Acid (CLA), Green Tea Leaf, White Tea Leaf, Garcinia (fruit), Chickweed, Prickly Pear (Fruit) Extract, St. John's Wort, Root, Mustard Seed, Cayenne Fruit, Kelp. OTHER INGREDIENTS: Certified Organic Brown Rice and Vegetarian Capsule(vegetable cellulose and water). Cleansing detox to reset your bodys metabolism and help cut cravings for fat and sugar This product is perfect for those who are interested in trying a Whole Foods or No Sugar/No Flour diet, as it can help assist the body during the toxin flush phase of early diet and nutrition changes. Take 1-2 capsules, 3 times daily, with meals for 1-2 months. Then 1 capsule daily for maintenance. Do not use if pregnant or nursing. Consult a health care professional prior to use if you have any pre-existing medical conditions or are taking any prescription medication. We want you to be completely satisfied with every purchase from us. If you are not 100% satisfied, please contact our customer service department within 30 days of receipt of your order for a prompt refund, credit or exchange (less shipping charges). 60 vegetarian capsules (Crystal Star) 90 Capsules (Nature's Wonderland) Organic - 575 mg, 60 Veg Capsules (Spirulina platensis) 60 Veg Capsules (Nature's Wonderland)
